comments:
1.  Workspace should not contain org.eclipse.jdt.debug.
2.  Paste the following stacktrace to the Java Stack Trace Console.
3.  Click on "JavaLineBreakpointTypeChange.java:59"
4.  Source not found dialog is shown.  The message is truncated and the dialog 
is not resizable.
